content: That's a great idea! There are many non-profit organizations that use live streaming events to fundraise or raise awareness for their causes. It's a great way to not only support a good cause but also to discover and learn about different organizations and the work they are doing. You can try searching for live streaming charity events on social media platforms like Facebook, Twitter, or Twitch, or check out websites dedicated to promoting charity events like Tiltify or GlobalGiving.
